data.prayer: Father, encourage the 21 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sarpang, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 21 believers in the state of Sarpang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 will die without Jesus in the next month in Sarpang, Bhutan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, grace the churches in Sarpang, Bhutan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Sarpang, Bhutan to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kachari Sonwal people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide the 21 believers in the state of Sarpang into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sarpang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Sarpang, Bhutan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Sarpang
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin, Bodo (Muslim traditions), Dakpa, Gongduk, Badaik
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin (6,100), Bodo (Muslim traditions) (2,700), Dakpa (4,400), Gongduk (2,400), Badaik (106,000)
